claim: Red Hot Chili Peppers are a heavy metal band.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Red Hot Chili Peppers , also sometimes shortened to The Chili Peppers or abbreviated as RHCP , are an American alternative rock/funk rock band formed in Los Angeles in 1983 .

claim: Red Hot Chili Peppers are a heavy metal band.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The group 's musical style primarily consists of rock with an emphasis on funk , as well as elements from other genres such as punk rock and psychedelic rock .

claim: Red Hot Chili Peppers are a heavy metal band.
premise_source_doc_sentence: When played live , their music incorporates elements of jam band due to the improvised nature of much of their performances .

claim: Red Hot Chili Peppers are a heavy metal band.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Currently , the band consists of founding members vocalist Anthony Kiedis and bassist Flea , longtime drummer Chad Smith , and former touring guitarist Josh Klinghoffer .

claim: Red Hot Chili Peppers are a heavy metal band.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Red Hot Chili Peppers are one of the best-selling bands of all time with over 80 million records sold worldwide , have been nominated for sixteen Grammy Awards , of which they have won six , and are the most successful band in alternative rock radio history , currently holding the records for most number-one singles  (  13  )  , most cumulative weeks at number one  (  85  )  and most top-ten songs  (  25  )  on the Billboard Alternative Songs chart .

claim: Red Hot Chili Peppers are a heavy metal band.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 2012 , they were inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame .

claim: Red Hot Chili Peppers are a heavy metal band.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The band 's original line-up , originally named Tony Flow and the Miraculously Majestic Masters of Mayhem , featured guitarist Hillel Slovak and drummer Jack Irons , alongside Kiedis and Flea .

claim: Red Hot Chili Peppers are a heavy metal band.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Because of commitments to other bands , Slovak and Irons did not play on the band 's self-titled debut album  (  1984  )  .

claim: Red Hot Chili Peppers are a heavy metal band.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Slovak performed on the second and third albums , Freaky Styley  (  1985  )  and The Uplift Mofo Party Plan  (  1987  )  , but he died from a heroin overdose in 1988 .

claim: Red Hot Chili Peppers are a heavy metal band.
premise_source_doc_sentence: As a result of his friend 's death , Irons chose to leave the group .

claim: Red Hot Chili Peppers are a heavy metal band.
premise_source_doc_sentence: After short-lived replacements at guitar and drums , John Frusciante and Chad Smith joined in 1988 .

claim: Red Hot Chili Peppers are a heavy metal band.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The line-up of Flea , Kiedis , Frusciante , and Smith was the longest-lasting and recorded five studio albums beginning with Mother 's Milk  (  1989  )  .

claim: Red Hot Chili Peppers are a heavy metal band.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 1990 , the group signed with Warner Bros. .

claim: Red Hot Chili Peppers are a heavy metal band.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Records and recorded the album Blood Sugar Sex Magik  (  1991  )  under producer Rick Rubin .

claim: Red Hot Chili Peppers are a heavy metal band.
premise_source_doc_sentence: This album became the band 's first commercial success , but Frusciante grew uncomfortable with it and left abruptly in 1992 in the middle of the Blood Sugar Sex Magik Tour .

claim: Red Hot Chili Peppers are a heavy metal band.
premise_source_doc_sentence: After two temporary guitarists , Dave Navarro joined the group in 1993 and played on their subsequent album , One Hot Minute  (  1995  )  .

claim: Red Hot Chili Peppers are a heavy metal band.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Although commercially successful , the album failed to match the critical or popular acclaim of Blood Sugar Sex Magik , selling less than half as much as its predecessor .

claim: Red Hot Chili Peppers are a heavy metal band.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Navarro was fired from the band in 1998 .

claim: Red Hot Chili Peppers are a heavy metal band.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Frusciante , fresh out of drug rehabilitation , rejoined the band that same year at Flea 's request .

claim: Red Hot Chili Peppers are a heavy metal band.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The reunited quartet returned to the studio to record Californication  (  1999  )  , which became the band 's biggest commercial success with 16 million copies worldwide .

claim: Red Hot Chili Peppers are a heavy metal band.
premise_source_doc_sentence: That album was followed three years later by By the Way  (  2002  )  , and then four years later by the double album Stadium Arcadium  (  2006  )  , their first number-one album in America .

claim: Red Hot Chili Peppers are a heavy metal band.
premise_source_doc_sentence: After a world tour , the group went on an extended hiatus .

claim: Red Hot Chili Peppers are a heavy metal band.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Frusciante announced he was amicably leaving the band in 2009 to focus on his solo career .

claim: Red Hot Chili Peppers are a heavy metal band.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Klinghoffer , who had worked both as a sideman for the band on their Stadium Arcadium tour and on Frusciante 's solo projects , replaced him .

claim: Red Hot Chili Peppers are a heavy metal band.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The band 's tenth studio album , I 'm with You , was released in 2011 and topped the charts in 18 different countries .

claim: Red Hot Chili Peppers are a heavy metal band.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The band released their eleventh studio album , The Getaway , in 2016 .

claim: Red Hot Chili Peppers are a heavy metal band.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The album was produced by Danger Mouse , marking the first time since 1989 's Mother 's Milk that the Red Hot Chili Peppers had not worked with Rubin , and topped the charts in ten different countries .

claim: Red Hot Chili Peppers are a heavy metal band.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The Red Hot Chili Peppers released their first three studio albums -- 1984 's The Red Hot Chili Peppers , 1985 's Freaky Styley , and 1987 's The Uplift Mofo Party Plan -- to virtually no commercial success during the mid to late 1980s .

claim: Red Hot Chili Peppers are a heavy metal band.

premise_source_doc_sentence: Hillel Slovak  (  ; April 13 , 1962 -- June 25 , 1988  )  was an American musician best known as the original guitarist and founding member of the Los Angeles rock band Red Hot Chili Peppers .

claim: Red Hot Chili Peppers are a heavy metal band.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The discography of John Frusciante , who is best known as the former guitarist of the rock band Red Hot Chili Peppers , consists of eleven solo albums and four EPs , as well as two albums with collaborators Joe Lally and Josh Klinghoffer under the name Ataxia and one EP and one album under the alias of Trickfinger .

claim: Red Hot Chili Peppers are a heavy metal band.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In late 2007 following the band 's Stadium Arcadium tour , the Red Hot Chili Peppers went on a hiatus , with Kiedis citing exhaustion as the main reason .
